long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ibis Paint X is a popular and versatile drawing app downloaded more than 400 million times in total as a series




















































Ibis Paint X for Chrome is a simple and powerful drawing extension. Open a new tab to sketch or edit images with ease. Key features include:

Drawing Tools: Pencil and eraser options for freehand drawing.
Image Import: Upload and edit images directly on the canvas.
Save and Clear: Save your work as .png or clear the canvas to start fresh.
User-friendly: Easy-to-use toolbar with essential features for quick access.
Ideal for quick sketches, image edits, or creative projects directly in your browser.
